mapper.insert: insert into student ( name, no, clazz_id, gender, phone, edu_id ) values ( #{name}, #{no}, #{clazzId}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{eduId} )
mapper.update:
update student
name = #{name},
no = #{no},
clazz_id = #{clazzId},
gender = #{gender},
phone = #{phone},
edu_id = #{eduId},
last_update_time = default
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select c.id as clazzId, c.name as clazzName, count(0) as num from student s left join clazz c on s.clazz_id = c.id group by c.id order by clazzId
select e.id as eduId, e.name as eduName, count(s.id) as num from edu e left join student s on s.edu_id = e.id group by s.edu_id, e.id order by eduId;
